column3: Verify that all products are displayed on the homepage.
column4: All products should be displayed correctly.

column3: Click on any product to view its details.
column4: The product detail page should load correctly.
column5: Product detail page loaded without issues.

column3: Click on 'Add to Cart' for a product.
column4: Product should be added to the cart.
column5: Product added successfully to the cart.

column3: Add and remove items from the cart.
column4: Cart should update correctly with the added/removed items.
column5: Cart updates correctly when items are added or removed.

column3: Click on a product to navigate to its detail page.
column4: The correct product detail page should load.
column5: Correct page loaded with the right details.

column4: Products should be filtered based on selected category.
column5: Products filtered correctly based on the selected category.

column3: Simulate a network failure and attempt to load a product.
column4: An error message should be displayed, indicating a failure.

column3: Enter invalid data in a product search or form.
column4: An appropriate error message should be displayed.
column5: Error message displayed for invalid input.

column3: Test the website on multiple devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
column4: The design should adjust and be responsive on all devices.
column5: Website design adapts correctly to various screen sizes.
